lines.text:
[to her wife]
Who are you calling a whore? Didn't Jaunkahns fuck you today?

[on a battle field between Russians and Finns]
Friends, Comrads!

[receives Jurmala's donation from Jaunkahns]
I know the nature of this money and that they are dyed with blood. But I accept them with gratitute. Otherwise they could be used in worse intentions.
